Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a Java class that acts as a RocketMQ producer to send messages to a specified topic using Apache RocketMQ client library.

Class Description: The RocketMQProducer class encapsulates the functionality to create, configure, and manage a RocketMQ message producer. It handles producer initialization, message creation, message sending, and producer shutdown.

Attributes:
- producer: DefaultMQProducer - The RocketMQ producer instance
- namesrvAddr: String - The address of the NameServer for service discovery
- producerGroup: String - The group name of the producer
- topic: String - The target topic for message sending
- messageSize: int - The size of the message to be sent

Methods:
- RocketMQProducer(String, String, String, int) - Constructor - Initializes the producer with NameServer address, producer group, topic, and message size
- start() -> void - Configures and starts the producer instance
- sendMessage() -> SendResult - Creates and sends a message to the configured topic
- shutdown() -> void - Shuts down the producer instance
